assets.description: DAX Index - Asia session sweep strategy

session_sweep.description: Session high/low breakout with reversal candle confirmation

signal_conditions.long: Price breaks above session high AND last candle is bearish (close < open)
signal_conditions.short: Price breaks below session low AND last candle is bullish (close > open)

vwap.description: VWAP mean reversion with standard deviation bands and reversal candle confirmation

signal_conditions.long: Price breaks below VWAP lower band AND last candle is bullish (close > open) AND previous candle was bearish AND lowest low of last 3 candles is the lowest in last 3 hours
signal_conditions.short: Price breaks above VWAP upper band AND last candle is bearish (close < open) AND previous candle was bullish AND highest high of last 3 candles is the highest in last 3 hours
